channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th January
item.description:
The drain has been blocked for years, leading to a large pools of water whenever it rains. This makes it difficult to cross the road especially for the disabled. It's been reported many times and was even supposed to have been resolved once, but is still the same.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 697, High Road, North Finchley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole road needs resurfacing, 25th January
item.description:
15yrs waiting & counting!
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant pothole at top of Cranbrook Road on left side entering from Capel Road, 25th January
item.description:
There is a significant pothole upon turning left into Cranbrook Road from Capel Road which is very difficult to avoid when cars are turning in and out of this road. Unable to photograph as this is a busy junction and unable to safely stop to take a photo, but this needs to be repaired before it causes injury to vehicles/cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53 - 55, Cranbrook Road, East Barnet, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish By st Josephâ€™s and all saints churches, 25th January
item.description:
Someone has dumped rubbish both ends of the wooded area between the two churches in Herbert Road. It is not from the on-going water works crisis. It appeared at some Point from midday to before 6pm yesterday . We are so fed up with rubbish around our streets

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Herbert Road, Woolwich
